issue.title: [R] Implement lubridate::with_tz and lubridate::force_tz
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17416](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17416). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17416?focusedCommentId=17579771) by Rok Mihevc (rokm):*
Reposting from ARROW-17414:
lubridate::with_tz is equivalent to assume_timezone and lubridate::force_tz is equivalent to casting timestamp(unit, "timezoneA") to timestamp(unit, "timezoneB").
